summary: This is an email from the AT&T Court Appearance Team to an unspecified recipient regarding a witness for the case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The email offers to schedule a preparation call with a witness located in Suffern, NY, prior to their court appearance.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the defendant in the criminal case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 CR 330 (AJN)).

events.title: Email regarding witness preparation
events.description: AT&T Court Appearance Team sends an email offering to schedule a prep call with a witness for the Ghislaine Maxwell case prior to their court appearance.

locations: 11760 US HWY 1, Suite 300, North Palm Beach FL 33408
keyFacts: The document is an email from the AT&T Court Appearance Team related to the criminal case USA v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 CR 330 (AJN)).
A witness for the case is located in Suffern, New York.
The email offers to schedule a preparation call with the witness prior to their court appearance.
The email originates from AT&T's Global Legal Demand Center in North Palm Beach, Florida.
The document is dated November 19, 2021, during the period leading up to Maxwell's trial.
